data.lyric:
[ti:Only Human]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Happiness Begins]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Only Human - Jonas Brothers (乔纳斯兄弟)
[00:01.19]Nick Jonas：
[00:18.19]Yeah ayy
[00:23.67]Joe Jonas：
[00:24.13]I don't want this night to end
[00:28.12]It's closing time so leave with me again
[00:32.63]Yeah
[00:34.44]You got all my love to spend oh
[00:38.44]Let's find a place where happiness begins
[00:42.39]Joe Jonas：
[00:43.39]We gon' dance in my living room slave to the way you move
[00:46.31]Hurts when I'm leaving you
[00:48.03]Ayy
[00:48.55]Just dance in the living room love with an attitude
[00:51.29]Drunk to an 80s groove
[00:53.16]Ayy
[00:53.61]We gon' dance in my living room slave to the way you move
[00:56.43]Hurts when I'm leaving you
[00:58.17]Ayy
[00:59.05]Dance in the living room love with an attitude
[01:01.58]Drunk
[01:02.44]Nick Jonas：
[01:03.53]It's only human you know that it's real
[01:08.51]So why would you fight or try to deny the way that you feel
[01:13.50]Oh babe you can't fool me your body's got other plans
[01:18.76]So stop pretending you're shy just come on and
[01:22.04]Dance dance dance dance oh
[01:24.99]Joe Jonas：
[01:35.16]Early morning la-la-light
[01:39.85]Only getting up to close the blinds oh
[01:45.58]I'm praying you don't change your mind
[01:47.89]'Cause leaving now just don't feel right
[01:51.01]Let's do it one more time oh babe
[01:54.85]Joe Jonas：
[01:55.21]We gon' dance in my living room slave to the way you move
[01:57.78]Hurts when I'm leaving you
[01:59.18]Hurts when I'm leaving you
[02:00.16]Just dance in the living room love with an attitude
[02:02.80]Drunk to an 80s groove
[02:04.69]Ayy
[02:05.07]We gon' dance in my living room slave to the way you move
[02:07.93]Hurts when I'm leaving you
[02:09.68]Ayy
[02:10.55]Dance in the living room love with an attitude
[02:13.03]Drunk
[02:13.79]Nick Jonas/Joe Jonas：
[02:15.20]It's only human you know that it's real
[02:18.78]Know that it's real
[02:20.03]So why would you fight or try to deny the way that you feel
[02:23.88]The way that you feel
[02:25.07]Oh babe you can't fool me your body's got other plans
[02:30.21]So stop pretending you're shy just come on and
[02:33.52]Dance dance dance dance oh
[02:36.86]Joe Jonas/Nick Jonas：
[02:37.47]Dance oh
[02:39.03]Woo ayy
[02:40.37]Only human
[02:41.98]It's only -man
[02:43.15]It's only -man
[02:44.28]Only human
[02:48.83]Oh yeah yeah yeah
[02:50.39]Only human
[02:52.07]It's only -man
[02:53.22]It's only -man

data.trans:
[ti:Only Human]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Happiness Begins]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.19]//
[00:18.19]//
[00:23.67]//
[00:24.13]我不愿让今夜结束
[00:28.12]快要打烊了 和我一起离开吧
[00:32.63]//
[00:34.44]你把我所有的爱耗费一空
[00:38.44]让我们找到一个幸福启航的地方
[00:42.39]//
[00:43.39]我们在客厅里翩翩起舞 我沉迷在你的舞姿里
[00:46.31]我离开你的时候 伤心不已
[00:48.03]//
[00:48.55]在客厅里翩翩起舞 享受当下
[00:51.29]沉醉在怀旧舞曲里
[00:53.16]//
[00:53.61]我们在客厅里翩翩起舞 我沉迷在你的舞姿里
[00:56.43]我离开你的时候 伤心不已
[00:58.17]//
[00:59.05]在客厅里翩翩起舞 享受当下
[01:01.58]烂醉如泥
[01:02.44]//
[01:03.53]普通人就能体会我此刻的心情 你心知肚明
[01:08.51]为何你要挣扎 试图否认你内心的感觉
[01:13.50]宝贝 你骗不了我 你的身体很诚实
[01:18.76]别再假装你很害羞 来吧
[01:22.04]尽情跳舞
[01:24.99]//
[01:35.16]清晨时分 阳光照进屋子
[01:39.85]我不情愿地起床 关上百叶窗
[01:45.58]我默默祈祷 你不会改变心意
[01:47.89]此刻离开 感觉一点都不好
[01:51.01]宝贝 让我重头开始
[01:54.85]//
[01:55.21]我们在客厅里翩翩起舞 我沉迷在你的舞姿里
[01:57.78]我离开你的时候 伤心不已
[01:59.18]我离开你的时候 伤心不已
[02:00.16]在客厅里翩翩起舞 享受当下
[02:02.80]沉醉在怀旧舞曲里
